articles.title: Mergers & Acquisitions Soared This Year. Stocks That Could Make 2026 Even Bigger.
articles.mainIdea: Mergers & Acquisitions Soared This Year. Stocks That Could Make 2026 Even Bigger.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Mergers & Acquisitions Soared This Year. Stocks That Could Make 2026 Even Bigger.. Mergers and acquisitions rose this year — and they can keep rising. Total M&A dollars so far this year rose to $4.39 trillion, according to data from London Stock Exchange Group. The increase in aggregate deal value is driven by larger deals, with the number of deals fairly stable. Related tickers mentioned: AMZN, CYBR, GOOG, NFLX, PANW.

articles.title: S&P 500 Record Sets Up a Santa Rally. This Could Be the Stock Market’s Scrooge and 4 Other Things to Know Today.

articles.summary: Barrons.com: S&P 500 Record Sets Up a Santa Rally. This Could Be the Stock Market’s Scrooge and 4 Other Things to Know Today.. A hot economy and cooling jobs leave the Fed in a bind, Alibaba shows China may be the next frontier for Nvidia and AMD, more news to start your day. Related tickers mentioned: AMD, NFLX, NVDA, WBD.

articles.title: Daily – Vickers Top Buyers & Sellers for 12/24/2025
articles.mainIdea: Daily – Vickers Top Buyers & Sellers for 12/24/2025
articles.summary: Argus Research: Daily – Vickers Top Buyers & Sellers for 12/24/2025. The Vickers Top Buyers & Sellers is a daily report that identifies the five companies the largest insider purchase transactions based on the dollar value of the transactions as well as the five companies the largest insider sales transactions based on the dollar value of the transactions. Related tickers mentioned: ABTC, AMLX, COO, OLMA, ORCL, PLX, WHF.
